data.title: Staff Reviews! Jo reads The Master & Margarita by Mikhail Bulgakov. "Okay, yes I am trying to recommend to you an experimental soviet...
data.meta_description:
44 likes, 2 comments - gibsonsbookstorenh on February 18, 2024: "Staff Reviews! Jo reads The Master & Margarita by Mikhail Bulgakov.

"Okay, yes I am trying to recommend to you an experimental soviet novel but please don’t run away. 

"While I can’t claim I completely understood this book I can tell you how it made me feel. Reading this book was joyful and fun and strange. I was more engaged by this novel than with anything I’ve read in years. It is a book that demands rereading and I so look forward to coming back to it again and again and again. 

"Ultimately, this story left me with a feeling of hope.

"Having lived through a handful of world-ending historical events I find comfort in the idea that when all else fails, Satan may be your only salvation.

"What can I say?

"At heart, I’ll always be an optimist."

gibsonsbookstore.com/Jo".
